descriptor.name: Nirlon Non-Stick Concave/Chapati Tawa - With Handle, 28.5 cm, 2.6 mm, 1 pc (Material - Aluminium) by Home & Kitchen Store
descriptor.short_desc: Nirlon presents this high-quality aluminium Non-stick tawa - a high-quality tawa which will add ease and comfort to your kitchen chores. This product is made from high-grade aluminium and is high in quality and durability. It flaunts a classy design and will look absolutely stunning in your kitchen. Use a wooden spatula for best results. Circular grooving on the bottom for quick and even distribution of heat, Scratch, and abrasion-resistant technology, Consumes lower gas, PFOA Free.
descriptor.long_desc: Specification Brand - Nirlon Body Material - Aluminium Type - Concave Tawa Colour - Red & Black Non-Stick - Yes Induction Bottom - No Lid included - No Handle Included - Yes Handle Material - Bakelite Dimensions - Diameter - 28.5cm, Base Thickness - 2.6 mm, Weight - 520gms Dishwasher safe - No Disposable - No Broiler safe - No Warranty - 1 year (Handle Not covered in warranty) Package Content - 1-piece flat Concave tawa. Care Instruction Wash and rinse utensil with liquid soap and lukewarm water. Do Not soak polycarbonate range in detergent or soap. Avoid the use of abrasive scrubbers and washing powders.

@ondc/org/statutory_reqs_packaged_commod.common_or_generic_name_of_commodity: Nirlon Non-Stick Concave/Chapati Tawa - With Handle, 28.5 cm, 2.6 mm, 1 pc

descriptor.name: Le Kaviraj Handi - Non Stick Coated, 30 cm, Glass Lid, 4 L, 1 pc (Material - Aluminum) by Home & Kitchen Store
descriptor.short_desc: Le Kaviraj Non-Stick Biryani Pot/Handi with Glass Lid is made from hard-anodized material with a lid. This is a modern version of the traditional Indian patila. These bowls are break resistant, heat resistant, dish wash safe, stain resistant and freezer safe. These Cook n Serve Stew pot spread heat evenly and retain warmth for a long time. They are easy to clean and durable enough to withstand drops without causing any damage. It is an excellent utensil for both cooking and serving. These are ideal for regular kitchen use for dining and serving with delight. The bowls are offered with elegantly designed hard-anodized lids. It is suitable for domestic gas, electric, ceramic and halogen cooktops.
descriptor.long_desc: Specification Brand: - Le Kaviraj. Type: - Handi with glass lid. Material: - Aluminum. Colour :- Maroon. Dimensions: - 300x300x138 Package Content: - 1 pcs. Multi Pack (Yes / No) :- No. Capacity - 4 L How to Use These are ideal for regular kitchen use for dining and serving with delight. In these Stew pots you can conveniently cook rice, dal, curries, and many popular desserts such as Firni, Sooji Halwa and Ras Malai. Benefits Made from hard-anodized. It is break resistant, heat resistant, dish wash safe, stain resistant and freezer safe.

descriptor.name: Hawkins Classic Inner Lid Pressure Cooker - With Handle, Silver, CL40, 4 l (Material - Aluminium) by Home & Kitchen Store
descriptor.short_desc: The Classic is Hawkins\' largest-selling, most popular range of pressure cookers - perhaps because of its attractive combination of features, benefits, and price. This range was the first to be introduced by Hawkins and has been kept up to date by numerous innovations and improvements over the years. It is suitable for gas, electric, ceramic and halogen cooktops. The handle stays cool and is long-lasting.
descriptor.long_desc: Specification Material: Aluminium. Capacity: 4 l Features: Inside fitting lid opens only when pressure falls, stay cool handles, Pressure is regulated automatically to optimum levels for speed cooking Shielded Safety valve. Type: Pressure Cooker. Colour: Silver. Brand: Hawkins. Induction: No Benefits Made from pure virgin aluminium. Super-fast cooking. The handle stays cool and is long-lasting. How to Use 1. Body is made up of steel and the handle is made up of Bakelite. 2. To make our daily cooking tasks easier, the invention of a pressure cooker has come of great help.

descriptor.name: Vinod Zest Casserole - 2 Layer, 20 cm, 3 mm, Glass Lid, Bakelite Handle, 3.1 (Material - Aluminium) by Home & Kitchen Store
descriptor.short_desc: Vinod Casserole with Lid is designed to keep your food warm and fresh. This casserole is a must-have addition to your kitchen accessories. It is durable and long-lasting as it is made with aluminium. It has heat-resistant handles. The casserole helps you to keep the food hot and fresh. The double-layer aluminium has better insulation. It is made with anti-bacterial, non-porous aluminium. They are available in different sizes and perfect for all kinds of foods.
descriptor.long_desc: Specification Brand:- Vinod. Type:- Casserole. Material:- Aluminium. Colour:- Blue/Black. Capacity:- 3.1 L Features:- Heat resistant, Metal Spoon Friendly, Non-Stick Coating, Dishwasher Safe, PFOA Free,100% Virgin aluminium Material Grade:- Aluminium Thickness:- 3 mm. Non-Stick:- Yes. Induction Friendly:- No. Handle Material :- Bakelite. Handle Included:- Yes. Lid Included:- Yes Lid Material:- Glass. Package Content :- 1 Pc Casserole w/lid. Benefits This aluminium casserole comes with a double-walled stainless steel lid. It keeps food hot and fresh for hours. Integrated side handles allow easy to carry from kitchen to dining table. Perfect for all types of food products. How to Use Perfect serving for any special occasions or household like birthday or anniversary parties, holiday, picnic. Keep your soup, salads, chapatti, roti or any beverages Hot/Cold for long hours.
